1675880.name: Unnatural : Land Of Dead
1675880.description: Unnantural : Land Of Dead is a Role Playing Game about Demons, Fallen Angels and Husks - Creatures of hell. In this game You will Play as Zion - a young Adventurer, who has some magical ability. Then there are minion enemy, mini bosses, big bosses and many NPCs, those of who will give you quest and tell you great stories. There will be a Co-Op feature for two players and also a survival Wave mode in near future.
1675880.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
